summary: As the daring thief Arsène Lupin (Romain Duris) ransacks the homes of wealthy Parisians, the Police, with a secret weapon in their arsenal, attempt to ferret him out.
cast: Romain Duris|Kristin Scott Thomas|Pascal Greggory|Eva Green|Robin Renucci|Patrick Toomey|Mathieu Carrière|Philippe Magnan|Philippe Lemaire|Marie Bunel|Françoise Lépine|Aurélien Wiik|Jessica Boyde|Guillaume Huet|Adèle Csech|Xavier Beauvois|Philippe Laudenbach|Gérard Chaillou|Alain Figlarz|Nicky Naudé|Christophe Laubion|Eric Vanzetta|Hervé Falloux|Sonia Dufeu|Alain Cauchi|Laurent Besançon|Rémy Roubakha|Michel Dourienne|Valérie Decobert-Koretzky|Simon Delétang|Stéphane Foenkinos|François Monnié|Arthur Dupont|Gaëlle Vincent|Jean-François Gallotte|Pierre Aussedat|Anne Suarez|Laurent Cotillard|Derrick Brenner|Marie-Thé Colmagne|Olivier Desautel|Arnaud Klein|Victor Loukianenko
keywords: coup d'etat|treasure hunt|master of disguise|kickboxing|immortal woman
title: Arsène Lupin
